location.name: Sri Lanka
location.activity-description: implemented by the Ministry of Environment, Sri Lanka.

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: 1). Number of joint initiatives between Agencies, Private Sector and NGOs formulated through the National Invasive Species Specialist Group & National Focal Point on Invasive Alien Species control 2). Availability of Invasive Alien Species policy and strategy 3). Availability of mechanism to maintain and update the data base on Invasive Alien Spices in Sri Lanka. 4). Invasive Alien Species act is developed for cabinet approval

baseline.comment: 1). Four joint activities implemented through inter-agency participation, with no private sector involvement (2011) Source: project document 2). Working draft of the national Invasive Alien Species policy; working draft of the national Invasive Alien Species strategy and action plan ( 2011) Source: project document 3). National data base is not available for Invasive Alien Species in Sri Lanka. ( 2011) Source: project document 4). No exist for Invasive Alien Species in Sri Lanka ( 2011) Source: project document

target.comment: 1). 5 ( only for this year ) 2). Draft policy and strategy are available 3). Draft database and developed mechanism is available 4). Develop draft Act and review by the public

actual.comment: 1). 0 2). Achieved target 3). No progress due to project management and institutional capacity issues 4). Preliminary draft act developed. But act was not reviewed by the public

target.comment: 1). 5 ( only for this year ) 2). Finalized Policy and Strategy documents available 3). Finalized database and developed mechanism is available 4). Cabinet paper develop on proposed act

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: 1. Number of policy actions on social integration and reconciliation implemented. 2. Number of people benefiting from mobile documentation clinics through this project 3. Number of events conducted to sensitize public on social integration

baseline.comment: 1. Two Policies in place: i. National Policy Framework for Social Integration launched; National action-plan under formulation; ii. Lessons Learnt and Reconciliation Commission report and action-plan in place (2013) 2. 0 ( 2013) 3. 1 (Social Integration Week since 2012)

actual.comment: 1. 0 2. 15,724 people 3. 4. They are (1) national kite festival, (2) Tri-Lingual Social Integration Calendar for school children about numerically small ethnic groups, (3) development of 25-episode teledrama on social integration, (4) Empowerment of Women as Agents of Change for social integration (40 women trained)

location.name: Anuradhapura District
location.activity-description: Anuradhapura

location.name: Ratnapura District
location.activity-description: Ratnapura

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: 1. District Case flow Management Committees (CFM) established 2. Number of priority cases identified to be addressed in three area models( courts, prosecution) 3. National legal aid policy developed 4. Number of land cases handled by dispute resolution mechanisms 5. Sector wide National coordination mechanism operational (identified through the national sector wide Steering Committee) 6. Number of key pieces of legislation consolidated and translated into both official languages

baseline.comment: 1. No Case F low Management Committee existing (2013) 2. No system to identify priority cases (2013) 3. There is no Legal Aid Policy ( 2013 ) 4. Dispute resolution mechanisms for land cases do not exist ( 2013) 5. No Sector wide Steering Committee ( 2013 ) 6. Legislation has not been consolidated or translated into local languages ( 2013 )

target.comment: 1. 1 of 3 Case flow Management Committees ( CFM ) established 2. Develop criteria for identifying priority cases for all three area models 3. Develop Terms Of Reference and Identify consultant to develop National Legal Aid Policy 4. consultations with key stakeholders on formation of special mediation boards for land cases 5. Justice Sector Steering Committee established 6. 02 pieces of legislature have been consolidated and translated

actual.comment: 1. Case flow Management Committees (CFM )were not established, initial discussions were held at national level to bring stakeholders together 2. Criteria was not developed 3. Terms Of Reference was developed and consultant was identified 4. Key stakeholders from the Justice sector, civil societies' members and key international organizations have been consulted on formation of special mediation boards, plans on way forward was agreed upon 5. The steering committee was not established. Initial discussions with key stakeholders have take place 6. Consolidation and translation of (1) Penal Code and (2) Criminal Procedure code is completed

target.comment: 1. 2 of 3Case flow Management Committees (CFM) committees established 2. Priority cases identified in area model 01 3. Draft Legal Aid Policy ready for review with key Stakeholders 4. Formation of special mediation boards for land cases 5. Sector Coordination plan identified 6. 02 more pieces of legislature have been consolidated and translated
